heading: HB04021
0: AN ACT MANDATING THAT BEFORE NATIONAL HEALTH INSURANCE PAYMENTS BE RELEASED, ALL HEALTH MAINTENANCE ORGANIZATION (HMO) BENEFITS OF THE SAME PHILIPPINE HEALTH INSURANCE CORPORATION (PHILHEALTH) MEMBER BE EXHAUSTED FIRST, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NO. 7875, AS AMENDED BY REPUBLIC ACT NO. 9241 AND REPUBLIC ACT NO. 10606, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE 'NATIONAL HEALTH INSURANCE ACT OF 2013'
status: Pending with the Committee on HEALTH since 2016-10-18
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04021
FULL TITLE : AN ACT MANDATING THAT BEFORE NATIONAL HEALTH INSURANCE PAYMENTS BE RELEASED, ALL HEALTH MAINTENANCE ORGANIZATION (HMO) BENEFITS OF THE SAME PHILIPPINE HEALTH INSURANCE CORPORATION (PHILHEALTH) MEMBER BE EXHAUSTED FIRST, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NO. 7875, AS AMENDED BY REPUBLIC ACT NO. 9241 AND REPUBLIC ACT NO. 10606, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE 'NATIONAL HEALTH INSURANCE ACT OF 2013'
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SUANSING, ESTRELLITA B.
DATE FILED : 2016-10-11
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH ON 2016-10-18
